name: force-semicolon
description: Helps you use semicolons correctly in JavaScript and TypeScript.

enumDescriptions: Show an info dialogue when a semicolon is missing.
Show warnings when a semicolon is missing.
Show errors when a semicolon is missing.
Doesn't show anything when a semicolon is missing.
force-semicolon.missingSemicolonLintType.description: The type of lint triggered when a semicolon is missing.

enumDescriptions: Show an info dialogue when a semicolon is unnecessary.
Show warnings when a semicolon is unnecessary.
Show errors when a semicolon is unnecessary.
Doesn't show anything when a semicolon is unnecessary.
force-semicolon.unnecessarySemicolonLint.description: The type of lint triggered when a semicolon is unnecessary.

enumDescriptions: Show an info dialogue when an extra semicolon is present.
Show warnings when an extra semicolon is present.
Show errors when an extra semicolon is present.
Doesn't show anything when an extra semicolon is present.
force-semicolon.extraSemicolonLintType.description: The type of lint triggered when an extra semicolon is present.

force-semicolon.debug.description: Shows extra logs and reports for extension actions and scanned files.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
